data: What is your reason for applying? Re-registration application for Temporary Protected Status (TPS) - applicant has previously been granted TPS Review the I-821 form information Here is a summary of all the information you provided in your application. Make sure you have provided responses for everything that applies to you before you submit your application. You can edit your responses by going to each application section using the site navigation. We also prepared a draft case snapshot with your responses, which you can download below. Lnea de servicio para los filtros Mann+Hummel-Wix Mexico (+52) 844 866 2150 Nuestra lnea gratuita de servicio h a sido expandida para servir mejor a las necesidades de nuestros clientes. Este servicio se encuentra disponible de lunes a viernes, de 8.30 a 17.30 (tiempo del centro). Si usted conoce el nmero de extensin del empleado al que quiere contactar, puede marcarlo en cualquier momento. Para todas las otras llamadas: Presione (+52) 844 866 2150 INFORMACIN SOBRE LOS FILTROS Si usted requiere asistencia para el intercambio de nmeros de parte, la disponibilidad o el precio de un nuevo nmero, aplicaciones no incluidas en los catlogos vigentes, las especificaciones o los atributos de los filtros, incluyendo informacin sobre el rendimiento, las presiones de rotura, las tasas de flujo, la tasa de CFM (pies cbicos por minuto) del filtro de aire e informacin sobre las dimensiones. Puede solicitar mayor informacin sobre aplicaciones especiales, resolucin de problemas y material informativo impreso. Presione +52 442 467 6802, +52 442 274 1968, +52 (442) 1031 133, - SERVICIO AL CLIENTE Si usted desea efectuar un pedido, verificar el estado de un pedido, el estado del inventario o preguntas sobre pedidos diferidos o atrasados. Presione +52 442 103 1100 ext.. 204 - MERCADOTECNIA Nosotros apreciamos la oportunidad de proporcionar estos servicios. Sus comentarios y sugerencias son bienvenidos. La aplicacin ms actual y mayor informacin tambin se encuentran disponibles en: www.wixfilters.com ADVERTENCIA SOBRE CORRELACIONES IMPORTANTE: Slo para referencia. No existen garantas expresas o implcitas con respecto a los productos seleccionados por tamao, caracterstica o referencia cruzada invlida. Las garantas solamente aplican para los productos seleccionados de acuerdo con la lista de aplicaciones del vehculo. Para las aplicaciones que no figuran en la lista, la cobertura de la garanta requiere una referencia cruzada vlida del OEM, tal como se describe en la Garanta Limitada WIX. Ningn producto ha sido certificado o garantizado para uso en aviacin. Ningn producto ha sido certificado o garantizado para la filtracin de combustible o aceite en aplicaciones de calefaccin. Este catlogo y toda la informacin aqu presentada, suplantan todos los catlogos y el material informativo previos sobre los filtros. Mann+Hummel - Wix Filters Mexico, Inc. WF10016Racor Fuel Systems - replaces Racor # S3226T - this has a one-piece design w/ drain - eliminates the plastic bowl required for the Racor design - for Racor design (plastic bowl required), use 33813 - if you wish to add a plastic bowl to the WF10016, can add bowl part # WS10003 - remove the drain sensor from the bottom of the filter, install the bowl, then install the drain sensor to the bottom of the bowl. SOFW6.8104.2301-14Attached3.9003.560.200 WF10018G-183Chrysler Family of Mini Vans (Std. Wheelbase) (96-00) F3.7002.100 WF10019G-184Chrysler Family of Mini Vans (Ext. 500FG Turbine Series Fuel Filter/Water Separator Contact Information Parker Hannifin Corporation Racor Division P.O. Box 3208 3400 Finch Road Modesto, CA 95353 phone 800 344 3286 209 521 7860 fax 209 529 3278 email racor@parker.com web parker.com/racor Instruction Part Number 15332 Rev H The Racor 500FG Turbine Series fuel filter/water separator protects the precision components of your engine from dirt, rust, algae, asphaltines, varnishes and especially water, which is prevalent in low distillate fuels. Contaminants are removed from fuel using the legendary three stage process described below. How It Works Stage 1 - Separation Using the fuel flow, the stationary turbine separates large solids and free water through enhanced centrifugal force. Stage 2 - Coalescing Smaller water droplets and solids coalesce on the conical baffle and fall into the collection bowl. Stage 3 - Filtration Engines will benefit from near 100% water separation and fuel filtration with Racors proprietary Aquabloc water repelling media. The replaceable filters are available in 2, 10, and 30 micron ratings. Mounting Instructions Installation Diagram Valve 1Valve 2 Fuel tanks above filter head pressure should not exceed maximum PSI of filter. Fuel Tank (Pressure Side Installation) Install a shut-off valve when fuel tank is higher than filter Fuel tank below filter. Do not exceed 5 (1.5m) of lift or 4 inches of mercury (inHg) of inlet piping restrictions Fuel Tank (Ideal Vacuum Side Installation) Fuel Tank (Vacuum Side Installation) Install a check valve (with light or no restriction) when tank is lower than filter to maintain prime. Pressure Side: Fuel transfer pump not to exceed maximum PSI or flow rate of filter. Not idealpumps emulsify water hindering filter performance. Fuel transfer pump (IDEAL vacuum side installation) Engine Maintain a clearance of at least 5 in. (12.7 cm) above and at least 2 in. (5.1 cm) below filter assembly to service unit and drain bowl. Valve 3 Suction (vacuum) Side: Primary (first) filter - use 30 micron. If it is the only filter in the system, use 2 or 10 micron. Optional Bypass Installation and Operation (allows user to service filter without shutting down engine) Valves123 Unit On-lineOpenOpenClosed Unit Off-lineClosedClosedOpen 500FG (Front) 4.0 in. (10.2 cm) 7.5 in. (19.1 cm) 4.5 in. (11.4 cm) 3/8 in. (1.0 cm) diameter clearance for fasteners V 10 Install 500FG Assembly within 10 of vertical These customer supplied materials should be on hand before beginning installation. Shop Towels Mounting Hardware Inlet/Outlet Fittings Fuel Hose Clean Diesel Fuel Parker Super O-lube or Clean Motor Oil Thread Sealant (no thread tapes) Positioning The Assembly Filter assemblies should be installed on vacuum side of fuel transfer pump for optimum water separating efficiency. See Installation Diagram. Keep fuel line restrictions to a minimum. Locate the 500FG filter assembly between horizontal planes of bottom of fuel tank and inlet of fuel pump, if possi

Air Filter Wraps Get Heavy Duty Protection For Light Duty Vehicles Most pickup trucks and utility vehicles are no strangers to heavy-duty dirt. If you drive off-road or on gravel roads, you need more protection than you get with a standard filter. WIX Filters Two-Stage Air Filter Gives You Heavy Duty Protection WIX Filters recognizes that all driving environments are not created equal and that some vehicles need more filtering capacity. To meet that need, we designed a foam rubber wrap that slips easily over your WIX air filter to provide extra dirt-holding capacity. l Traps particles without restricting air flow. The foam rubber wrap is specially designed for efficient air flow. l Increases up to 100% of the dirt holding capacity of your filter. That saves you money by extending the life of your filter and giving your engine greater protection. l Slips on easily. To install your WIX filter wrap, simply slip it over your WIX air filter. We have a size for most light truck applications. See the chart below for the filters that utilize the new filter wraps. Multiple Usage In-Line Fuel Filters 33500 has adjustable cradles on both ends These cover a wide range of usage on many Japanese based vehicles. The ability to simply rotate the filters to provide the correct cradle angle and position provides immediate coverage for many new models without having to wait for new product introductions. Along with greatly reducing inventory levels, these filters offer the advantages of coated steel construction, new copper washers for leak-free fittings and easy installation. The installation procedure for this filter is as simple as depressurizing the system, carefully removing the old filter, selecting the correct position for the new filter and properly installing it. 33502 has adjustable cradle on one end only 1088 Gaskets By Part Number SHAPE: HEX Hexagon; IRR Irregular; OVL Oval; RD Round; REC Rectangular; SQ Square; TRP Tapered; TPZ Trapezoid; L L Shaped MATERIAL: COR Cork; FIB Fiber; FOA Foam; M & F Metal & Fiber; MET Metal; PAP Paper; REG Regular; SOL Solid Rubber; V Viton; PL - Plastic Gasket No. Drawing No. Filter Number Design Illust. Used with 51954 1098 Fuel Filters - Special Applications Dispensing Equipment Fuel Pump Filters A spin-on filter designed for either gasoline or diesel fuel (part no. 24006) was developed for use on dispensing pumps between the pump and the meter. It guarantees the delivery of clean fuel to the vehicle while also protecting the pump meter. The filter can easily be installed, inside or outside the pump. For applications involving a severe dirt situation, the longer 24347 filter can be used. Part number 24348 can be used for dirt and water removal. If the pump does not come equipped with a filter (and most pump s dont), two filter mounting ba ses are available. The bases are identical except for the inlet and outlet thread sizes and either base will accept the filters listed below. Coolant Products How To Use WIX S.S.I. Coolant Products With Supplemental Coolant Additives (S.C.A.s) Initial Installation For best product and system performance, the following procedures are required: 1. Start with a clean cooling system. If you system is dirty, completely drain the entire system and chemically clean it with a heavy duty cooling system cleaner. After the system has been cleaned, thoroughly flush the entire system with clean water to insure all the chemical cleaner is removed. 2. Refill your cooling system with the following: 40% to 60% low silicate glycol based antifreeze and clean, soft water. The antifreeze can be either ethylene or propylene glycol type. Engine manufacturers recommend using 50% antifreeze and 50% suitable water. Clean soft water is defined as clear water containing no more than the following: Chloride 40 parts per million or less Sulfates 100 parts per million or less Hardness 170 parts per million or less (Calcium/Magnesium) The preferred water for use in cooling systems is deionized, distilled or demineralized. However, if you are using tap water and are unsure of its suitability for use in your cooling system, consult your water supplier for the values of these contaminants or have it evaluated by our coolant analysis laboratory. 3. Refer to the initial service and maintenance chart. Find your cooling systems TOTAL CAPACITY in the left hand column. Then to the right, under column labeled initial installation, find the correct WIX S.S.I. coolant product for your system. Install the correct filter and if necessary, the correct amount of WixCool. Your cooling system is now ready for use. (Maintenance charts are also inclu ded with each filter). S.S.I. Maintenance Procedures 1. Find your cooling systems TOTAL CAPACITY under the maintenance section of the chart. Then to the right of the capacity, select the correct maintenance filter or filter and WixCool liquid combination for the maintenance interval desired. Properly install the selected products in your cooling system. 2. Use a WIX Cooling System Test Kit. To insure that the antifreeze concentration, the coolants pH level and the WIX coolant conditioner additives are at the proper level, check the cooling system condition every 250 hours or 15,000 miles with

Starting Right Before changing the coolant, the system should be thoroughly flushed to remove any contamination. A clean system is free of solid contaminants and oil. Make-Up Water Proper coolant system maintenance requires quality make-up water. All make-up water is corrosive but water with a high mineral content cannot be made fit for use. As soft of tap water as possible should be used. Tap water that has been softened by some type of salt or chloride process should not be used. Most engine manufacturers have set up specifications for water used in their engines. The following chart shows some of these specifications. Caterpilla r Cummins Detroit Hardness 100ppm 300ppm 170ppm Chlorides 40ppm 100ppm 40ppm Sulfates 100ppm 100ppm 100ppm Total Dissolved Solids 340ppm 500ppm 340ppm Antifreeze Antifreeze, glycol, propylene glycol or long life/extended life, should be used in the cooling system year round. The glycol in the antifreeze provides freeze protection. It also provides a stable environment for gaskets and seals. These same gaskets will shrink in straight water and leakage could occur. Some of the major problems we see in cooling systems today occur due to antifreeze related problems. One of the most publicized problems is silicate gelation/dropout. Silicate gel problems have increased in frequency since the early 1980s. The two major causes of this problem are: 1. High Silicate Antifreeze 2. Over-conce ntration of antifreeze a nd/or Supplemental Coolant Additives. All antifreezes used in todays heavy-d uty engines should meet GM 6038M or ASTM D-4985 specifications for silicate content. The antifreeze concentration should be held between 40% and 60% (40% antifreeze and 60% water to 60% antifreeze and 40% water). A 50% blend is ideal. The use of a refractometer or hydrometer will insure the glycol concentration levels are maintained properly. Another problem caused by over concentration is water pump leakage. In a study by Cummins Engine Company, 54% of the water pump failures they examined occurred due to over concentration. 78% of the total pumps examined showed over concentration regardless of the cause of the failure. Using th e proper amou nt of a high quality Supplemental Coolant Additive (SCA) is very critical in preventing the problems mentioned in the chart on the previous page. When filling a cleaned system with fresh antifreeze and water, a Supplemental Coolant Additive (SCA) is required. These additives may contain inhibitors not found in todays antifreeze. When pre-charging, be sure to use the proper pre- charge filter for yo ur size cooling system or 4 ounces (120 ml) of liquid Supplement Coolant Additive (SCA) per gallon (3.8ltr) of coolant (4 ounce [120ml] requirement based on the most common Supplemental Coolant Additive). In either case, be sure to follow the Supplemental Coolant Additive (SCA) manufacturers specifications. Service Supplemental Coolant Additives (SCA) are used up (depleted) while in the process of protectin

Information About Antifreeze (Glycol) Ethylene (EG) & Propylene (PG) Traditional: Inorganic Acid Technology (IAT ) Automotive Automotive/Conventional Traditional coolant formulated to provide protection for automotive gasoline engines. Mixture includes high levels of silicates to protect aluminum parts in automotive engines. May also contain phosphates. Not suitable for use in heavy medium duty diesel engines. No SCA used with this type of coolant. Heavy Duty Standard Service Interval (S.S.I) No to very low levels of silicates. Not suitable for use in automotive gasoline engines. Must use SCAs. Often labeled as a Fleet or Heavy Duty coolant. Intended to provide corrosion protection only when used and maintained with SCAs. Requires Pre-Charge of SCAs to establish proper inhibitor levels, followed by lower doses of SCAs in a Maintenance amount. SCAs are available in both liquid and dry form. Manufacturers recommendations for Pre- Charge and Maintenance doses and intervals must be followed. Requires SCA testing. Pre-Charged Standard Service Interval (S.S.I) Traditional HD coolant with low to no levels of silicates premixed with a Pre-Charge level of SCAs and deionized quality water. No additional charge of SCAs should be used on Initial installation. Does require Maintenance dose of SCAs thereafter. Requires SCA testing. Slow Release Service Interval (S.R.I.) Specially formulated SCA package that releases over time. Used with traditional low/no silicate coolant to extend the maintenance service intervals. Requires SCA testing. Extended Service Interval (E.S.I.) Specially formulated SCA package that requires less maintenance over time. Used with low/no silicate coolant to extend the maintenance service intervals. Requires SCA monitoring and maintenance. Extended/Long Life: Organic Acid Technology (OAT) Automotive Organic Acid Technology OAT Formulated with ethyl hexanoic acid as its chief organic inhibitor. It does not use any traditional buffers thus it is commonly called a full OAT coolant. i.e. Dexcool. No additional SCAs used with this coolant. Hybrid Organic Acid Technology HOAT Formulated with both organic inhibitors plus strong buffer compounds. Often uses borates one of the buffer compounds. As a mixture with traditional buffers and OAT inhibitors, this coolant is called a Hybrid thus the acronym HOAT. i.e. G-05 Gold Some HOAT coolants also incorporate nitrite buffer compounds and are recommended by their manufacturer for use in light duty to medium duty diesel engines. No additional SCAs used with this coolant. Partial Organic Acid Technology POAT Organic Acid based coolant forumulated for use in automotive engines with high levels of aluminum parts. Developed to be more compatible with seal and system components. Not suitable for use in medium or heavy duty diesel engines. No additional SCAs used with this coolant. Often premixed with deionized water. Heavy Duty Nitrited Organic Acid Technology NOAT Organic Acid based glycol coolant formul

Double Protection Oil Analysis System 24077 24078 24290 Simply order the WIX Filters Double Protection Oil Analysis Kit you need. Part No. 24077 - Contains sample bottle for used oil, request sheet and mailer container. Instructions included. Part No. 24078 - Contains sample bottle for used oil, request sheet, mailer container and section of 1/4 inch plastic tubing. Instructions included. Part No. 24290 - Contains a section of 1/4 inch plastic tubing and suction pump. Instructions included. Be sure to follow the directions thoroughly in filling out the request form and obtaining the oil samples. Analysis for wear metal concentration can be evaluated and wear rates determined only if all pertinent information necessary for analysis is available. To help us better evaluate your vehicles used oil, the request sheet must be accurately completed. Only with all of this information can precise determinations of wear rates be made. Since concentrations of suspended materials are not necessarily the same throughout the lubricating system, proper sampling techniques must be employed (sampling instructions are provided on the back of the request form). In fact, improper sampling procedures can lead to misleading results. For more information please visit our web site at www.wixconnect.com. 1129

ACK40 Installation Instructions Installation of AquaChek filters requires a filter mounting base (see above chart for proper base + filter) and tools to cut and thread the airline at the location the filter mounting base is being installed. It is recommended that a self-venting water trap be installed between the air compressor and the AquaChek mounting base and filter. This will prolong the life of the AquaChek filter. Important: The AquaChek mounting base must be installed a minimum of 10 feet away from the compressor. This allows the air to cool enough to achieve maximum moisture removal. It is vital that the inlet and outlet sides of the mounting base be installed with the proper configuration. It is recommended a flow control valve be installed just before the filter to prevent possible polymer migration. Change Out Circuit: In situations where taking the compressor off line for filter changes is undesirable, the installation of an isolation circuit around the filter system is recommended. The isolation circuit requires 2 two-way valves installed to allow routing of air around the filter system during filter change-outs. Note: Apply thread-sealing tape to all male thread surfaces when installing the

The materials are tested to ensure a wide range of chemical compatibilities. The W05AX Series features high impact resistant ABS top and bottom caps. The clear acrylic tube make it easy to inspect the condition of the color-changing silica gel from a distance. The silica gel turns from gold to dark green to visually indicate the adsorption of moisture and to con rm that the breather is getting the job done. Ideal For: Storage Tanks Fluid Reservoirs Transformers Pumps Gearboxes High Vibration Shock Resistant Breathers: W06AX Series breathers are ideal for these high vibration, mobile applications, including off-road, construction and farm vehicles. W06AX Series desiccant breathers are eas- ily mounted in place of standard breather caps via rugged steel pipe threads and a reusable metal base. When the gold silica gel cartridge turns dark green, simply install a new replacement cartridge to keep things moving. Ideal For: Cranes Railroad Maintenance of Way Equipment Farm Construction Off-Road Trucks and Equipment High Humidity / High Dust Breathers: W07AX Series breathers are the perfect solution for high humidity and high dust environments. The W07AX Series incorporates 2 check valves and a reusable top cap. The valves provide a closed system until air ow is required, extending the service life of the desiccant. In addition to having a rugged design, W07AX Series breathers include a top cap that can be reused when the desiccant is spent. The rebuildable design allows for easy replacement of the desiccant cartridge. Ideal For: Paper Mills Wash-Down Areas Steam Cleaning Areas Mines & Quarries Limited Space Applications: W08AX Series breathers are designed for applications where space is limited or air ow requirements are below 10 cubic feet per minute (CFM). Industrial Breathers: Clean Dry Air W10AX LONGER LIFE Premium Breather The W10AX Premium Desiccant Breather Series offers several ad- vantages over other constructions. Longer life, Check Valve Technology, an Isolation Valve, and a 2 Micron solid particulate lter make this series suitable for a wide range of uses including fume emitting applications. Reusable top and bottom caps readily accommodate replacement cartridges making the W10AX Breather Series a cost effective, ef cient option for both solid contaminant and moisture control. The breathers color coded guide along with the clear acrylic tube makes it easy to monitor the condition of the color-changing silica gel. This feature, along with the easy screw in/out replacement cartridges, make servicing the product a snap! Goelen 4 7 2 Agriculture Catalogue Air Filtration Donaldson air fi lters contain fi lter media specially formulated to trap contaminants such as dirt, dust and soot before they reach your engine. PowerCore air fi lters are designed to allow high airfl ow in minimal space. RadialSeal design provides the most consistent and reliable seal and the best protection for your engine. DURAMAX Lube Filtration Donaldson lube fi lters protect your engine by capturing wear metals, soot and other contaminants in your engine oil. Donaldson Endurance lube fi lters with Synteq fi lter media help extend service intervals. Fuel Filtration Donaldson fuel fi lters help prevent premature injector and pump wear by delivering clean fuel to your engine. The Twist&Drain fuel fi lter water separator takes the mess out of draining water from your fi lter. Hydraulic Filtration A full line of hydraulic and transmission fi lters protect expensive hydraulic components. Duramax fi lters have become the industry standard for operating pressures up to 350 psi (24 bar). Filtration Accessories Donaldson TopSpin self-ejecting pre-cleaners extend air fi lter and equipment life. Filter service indicators reduce air fi lter maintenance costs and eliminate over-servicing. Vacuator valves, standard on many air cleaners, are vital to the functionality of the air cleaner during pre-cleaning. Muffl ers & Ex

data: Los sistemas de frenado neumtico necesitan secadores de aire para funcionar con seguridad Los sistemas de frenado neumtico se utilizan generalmente en vehculos de servicio pesado, como camiones y autobuses, as como en otros vehculos grandes que muevan cargas pesadas. Debido a las condiciones de funcionamiento del vehculo, as como a la compresin de aire que requiere el sistema de frenado neumtico, es posible que la humedad y la condensacin penetren en el sistema. Cuando esto ocurre, el sistema de frenado neumtico se ve comprometido y, si no se elimina la humedad, puede resultar afectada la funcionalidad del freno neumtico. Adems, en condiciones de funcionamiento adversas, la humedad puede congelarse, lo que provocara un fallo total de los frenos. Cmo funciona el secador de aire El sistema de frenado neumtico de su vehculo incluye un compresor de aire accionado por el motor. El compresor de aire garantiza que el sistema de frenado neumtico est cargado y listo para detener el camin o triler cuando el operador accione los frenos. Cuando el compresor introduce aire ambiental en los frenos neumticos, penetra humedad en el sistema, especialmente en condiciones hmedas o lluviosas. Al comprimir el aire, este se calienta y se enfra, lo que provoca una condensacin adicional que aumenta la cantidad de humedad en el sistema. Para eliminar la humedad en el sistema de frenado neumtico, el secador de aire controla dos operaciones. En primer lugar, el secador de aire purga intermitentemente el agua que se acumula al enfriar el aire y la libera en el exterior. En segundo lugar, a medida que el aire fluye a travs del secador de aire, un agente desecante llamado cartucho desecante elimina cualquier resto de humedad en el sistema para asegurar el funcionamiento ptimo del sistema de frenado neumtico. Adems de eliminar la humedad, un secador de aire tambin elimina las fugas de aceite del compresor de aire, as como el polvo y los residuos que puedan pasar por el sistema de filtracin de la entrada de aire. Los secadores de aire Fleetguard ofrecen un rendimiento extraordinario para una amplia gama de aplicaciones El secador de aire Fleetguard garantiza un elevado rendimiento con la calidad de una pieza original para asegurar que su sistema de frenado neumtico funcione siempre que lo necesite. Nuestros medios filtrantes de coalescencia ofrecen una capa adicional de proteccin al absorber aceite y otros residuos, de modo que, independientemente de sus condiciones de funcionamiento, los secadores de aire Fleetguard funcionarn. Fleetguard oferta una amplia gama de secadores de aire para diversas aplicaciones, entre los que se incluye... Secadores de aire para aplicaciones en el mercado europeo de camiones y autobuses cumminsfiltration.com LT36714ES 2021 Rev. 2 Cummins Filtration Inc. La mejor garanta de la industria. La garanta de Cummins Filtration se extiende a toda nuestra lnea de productos, una garanta de rendimiento y cobertura sin competencia. Visite cumminsfiltration.c

Filtracin de aire HOJA DE DATOS La importancia de la fi ltracin de aire Por cada litro de combustible consumido, un motor disel moderno necesita por lo general 15.000 litros de aire. Por lo tanto, un aire de calidad pobre puede tener un impacto signifi cativo en el desgaste y en el rendimiento del motor. Por este motivo, es esencial contar con una fi ltracin de aire efi caz para proteger el motor frente a los contaminantes en partculas. Entre los sntomas de un mantenimiento defi ciente se incluyen el taponamiento de los fi ltros de aire, la reduccin del rendimiento del motor y el aumento del consumo de combustible. Polvo >> Restriccin >> Vida til del fi ltro La vida til de un motor se determina por medio de la tasa a la cual "ingiere" contaminantes abrasivos. Aproximadamente 1 gramo de polvo por CV sera sufi ciente para destruir un motor. A diferencia del cuerpo humano, que dispone de diferentes sistemas y sensores de fi ltracin para advertir de la presencia de aire nocivo, el fi ltro de aire es la nica proteccin de un motor frente a un dao potencial. El motor dispone de una oportunidad, una nica oportunidad, para eliminar el polvo. A medida que el fi ltro elimina progresivamente los contaminantes, aumenta el nivel de restriccin. Al igual que una nariz congestionada, un motor necesita realizar un mayor esfuerzo para introducir aire cuando el fi ltro de aire est bloqueado. Para el motor resultar ms difcil "respirar" debido a la elevada restriccin, lo cual se traducir en una reduccin de la potencia disponible y en un aumento del consumo de combustible. Con el fi n de disponer de una indicacin visual de la vida til del fi ltro, deber montarse un indicador de restriccin en el lado limpio de la carcasa. Diferentes entornos de trabajo requieren diferentes soluciones de fi ltracin de aire. Las aplicaciones marinas, por lo general, no estn sometidas a concentraciones de polvo elevadas, aunque s a un aire hmedo y salino. Por el contrario, el equipamiento utilizado en los sectores de la agricultura y la minera est expuesto a unos niveles de polvo muy elevados. Una concentracin de polvo reducida requiere una fi ltracin de aire de servicio ligero Un limpiador de aire de servicio ligero por lo general consistir en una carcasa del limpiador de aire de una sola etapa. Una concentracin de polvo elevada requiere una fi ltracin de aire de servicio pesado Un sistema de limpiador de aire de servicio pesado incluir: Carcasa del limpiador de aire de dos etapas (prelimpieza incluida) Elemento del fi ltro principal Elemento del fi ltro de seguridad* *A menudo, al fi ltro de seguridad se le denomina errneamente "fi ltro secundario" al estar situado despus del fi ltro principal. No obstante, el fi ltro de seguridad NO elimina partculas fi nas con una mayor efi cacia en comparacin con el elemento del fi ltro principal. Se encuentra ah nicamente en caso de que el fi ltro principal presente un defecto y para evitar la penetracin de polvo durante la sustitucin del fi ltro pr

Clean Fuel & Lubricant Solutions Why Filter Fuels & Lubricants? Todays sophisticated equipment, such as diesel engines with increased injection pressures, requires higher cleanliness levels than ever before. Donaldson bulk filtration systems save on costly component replacement, prevent unplanned downtime and prevent a decrease in fuel efficiency due to injector wear. fuente: Cabin Air- Activated Carbon Filters for Agricultural Machinery - Europe-Spanish.pdf
data: Filtros de carbn activo para maquinaria agrcola Proteccin de operarios de contaminantes perjudiciales Los filtros de aire de cabina que contienen una capa de carbn activo retienen compuestos orgnicos voltiles (COV) y molculas que producen olor mediante un proceso llamado adsorcin. Los COV normalmente son sustancias qumicas artificiales, como herbicidas y combustibles petrolferos, que se emiten como gases de slidos o lquidos. La capa de carbn activo tambin aumenta en gran medida el rea de la superficie y la capacidad de retencin del filtro. Adems de la capa de carbn, se requiere una capa de partculas para filtrar partculas como polvo, suciedad o polen. AIRE DE CABINA fleetguard.com Right products. Trusted advice. 2024 Atmus Filtration Technologies Inc. LT37320 Intervalo de servicio El intervalo de servicio debe basarse en la recomendacin del fabricante de equipos originales. Sin embargo, en entornos de trabajo que presenten mucha suciedad, los filtros de aire de cabina deben sustituirse con una mayor frecuencia. La apariencia del filtro ser ms oscura fuera de la caja debido a la capa de carbn, pero esto no significa que est sucio. Est listo para el trabajo. Donaldson cabin air filters remove irritants before they enter the vehicle cab, keeping the air you breathe cleaner. Durable, dependable and built for the long haul, Donaldson cabin air filters are constructed to the same quality standards as the original manufacturers filter. You can also breathe easier knowing that you can find your cabin air filter at Donaldson. With a wide variety of cabin air filters available for on-highway trucks, Donaldson has you covered. We all used to think it... Filters are filters and fluids are fluids. Then we had some realizations, like uptime is money made, and downtime is money spent. Thats when we took a dierent spin on filters and fluids made to help you work more and spend less. So, whats the actual dierence? Come see for yourself. Explore product comparisons, customer results, and how every design element helps you do more. Ready to see the real dierence? Lets take a closer look. CAT FILTERS AND FLUIDS a picture saves a thousand dollars. Okay, we didnt get the quote right. But we got the right filters and fluids for your Cat equipment. You invested in a top-quality machine. Why choose filters and fluids that wear down its components? From power shift transmissions to clutches to brakes no one knows your machines friction devices better than the ones who engineered it. Let us show you. Think oil is oil? This destructive piston pump test shows the advanced formula in Cat oil performs beyond where competitors stop. ITS LIKE THE OLD SAYING, Some companies make filters to sell filters. Caterpillar makes filters to protect your Cat machine. This performance study proved Cat filters can increase injector life by 45 percent. A customer trial backed it up, reporting a 41 percent longer injector life. Its a quick $1,000 to replace an injector and thats the low end. Pro-tip: Choose Cat filters to get up to 10,000 hours before replacing injectors, instead of replacing every 6,000 hours. BEYOND THE IRON LETS TALK BUSINESS. Its not as easy to see the dierence with fluids, but its very real. You often think of one thing when buying fluids, Does it meet specifications? Cat Fluids exceed industry specs, and go far beyond in performance testing and quality control. Formula experts work closely with component engineers to ensure the lifeblood of the equipment is in tune with friction thresholds. Whats the Dierence with Cat Filters? Theres a resounding response, Cut it open. Cat filters are simply designed to be di erent, so you get di erent outcomes. Unique features like the spiral roving and non-metallic centertube deliver you an edge that competitors simply cant replicate. PRODUCT BROCHURE DURABLE CAT DESIGN REDUCED OWNING AND OPERATING COSTS SYSTEM APPROACH CAT FILTERS CAT FILTERS, FLUIDS AND S O S SM MAINTAIN PEAK MACHINE PERFORMANCE DURABLE CAT DESIGN Cat Filters are designed to maintain peak performance for your machine. Urethane end caps, top grade media, spiral roving, acrylic beads, and a nylon reinforced center tube help achieve a high level of protection to keep your system clean. REDUCED OWNING AND OPERATING COSTS Cat Filters are essential to keeping your equipment running smoothly and efficiently. The filters capture harmful particles and maintain system cleanliness. By investing in high quality Cat Filters, your equipment is protected and performing at its peak. Improved system health means components last longer, lowering your owning and operating costs. SYSTEM APPROACH Using Cat Filters and Cat Fluids is the first step in enhancing the system health of your equipment. The second is Cat S O S SM fluid analysis, a routine check-up for your oil, coolant, and hydraulic fluid. Regular fluid analysis allows you to extend drain intervals, avoid costly failures by identifying contaminants early, and help your equipment thrive. Designed with the entire system in mind, Cat Filters protect the critical systems of your machine. They are manufactured to Caterpillars stringent specifications for your added peace of mind. WHAT MAKES CAT FILTERS THE PREFERRED CHOICE? Did you know that all filters are not created equal? Its true! Over 30 years ago, Caterpillar researched whether filters actually made a difference. The results are clear. Filters matter to equipment protection and performance. By using Cat Filters, not only will your equipment last longer and perform better, but youll also save money in the long run with less repair work and more uptime. So, when it comes to filters, the obvious choice is Cat Filters. CAT FILTERS ARE DESIGNED WITH ROBUST ENGINEERING TO ENHANCE THE CAT COMPONENTS AROUND THEM Engine Lube Oil Fuel/ Water Separator (primary) Fuel (secondary) Hydraulic Power Train (transmission) Engine AirBreather Standard Efficiency 30-4 0 m>20 m>10 m27-40 m27-40 mMin. 9 9.6%* *>50 m Advanced High Efficiency 15-30 m10-20 m4 -10 m10-27 m10-27 mN/A10-50 m UHE Ultra High Efficiency <15 m<10 m<4 m<10 m<10 mMin. 9 9.9 %* *<10 m **Using ISO5011 Test method for mass separation ef ficiency ONE PIECE ALUMINUM TOP PL ATE MOLDED URETHANE END CAPS NON-METALLIC TUBE SPIRAL ROVING ACRYLIC BEADS ONE-PIECE CANISTER MAINTAIN PEAK MACHINE PERFORMANCE Just as important, but harder to see, is the application-based nature of the filter design. Where competitors often create filters to general specifications, Cat Filters are designed alongside Cat equipment and Cat Fluids to ensure the entire system thrives. From flow rates to efficiencies, Cat Filter design engineers work to enhance the performance of the equipment for the most rugged applications. We call it the Cat system approach. ALUMINUM TOP PLATE Different because it all

FILTERS 290 Cat Filter Features Aluminum Top Plate - Non-Ferrous metal - Reduces harmful contaminates - More thread engagement Canister - Thickest can in the industry - One piece can design - Maximizes structural strength - Minimizes potential leaks Cat Element Features Spiral Roving Reduces pleat flex and fatigue Maximizes media surface utilization Increases contaminate retention Non-Metallic Center Tube Stronger than metal Maximum cleanliness Acrylic Beading Prevents Bunching Maximizes media surface area utilization Urethane End Caps One-piece design Media molded into urethane Eliminates possible leak paths 291 New Cat Filter Products New Cat Filter Products Unique cartridge elements ... install the right filter Improved media... optimal performance and protection No-metallica elements... less waste and disposal cost Reusable housing.... lower O&O cpsts Compact design ....commonality between many machines Easy and clean filter changes ....integrated seals, drains, etc. Unique Fit Features Multi-layered media Improved efficiency Increased capacity Housing drain Promotes clean change Ensures correct filter used Pre-fill deterrent (Fuel Only) Provides clean fuel system Integrated seal Easy installation External positive stop Correct installation torque 292 Engine Oil Filters Improved Filtering Media Cat Advanced Efficiency Oil Filters contain an improved filtering media which captures more contaminants, reducing wear on critical oil-lubri- cated engine components. This results in extended life and improved performance. The graphs below illustrate the efficiency of the 1R-1807 and 1R-1808 filters as compared to their Standard Efficiency Counterparts. Reserve Dirt-Holding Capacity Although higher-efficiency filters accumulate dirt more quickly than Standard Efficiency filters, Cat Advanced Efficiency Engine Oil filters do not require a shortened change interval. They feature a reserve dirt-holding capacity, which compensates for the majority of dirt ac- cumulation increase, letting customers maintain standard oil change intervals. The relative dirt-holding capacity of Advanced and Stand- ard Efficiency filters are illustrated in the graph. 293 Filters Overview Cat Filters...Engineered protection for every application The consistent quality of Cat Filters is your best protection. When you see inside a Cat Filter, the difference is clear. The advanced design fea- tures found in Cat Filters combine to deliver maximum filtration efficiency and the protection you need to get the most out of your equipment. Genuine parts optimized for Cat Equipment. Manufactured worldwide to Caterpillar specifications for global quality assurance. Complete line of products and services to meet your business needs. Cat Liquid Engine Filters Fuel Primary Secondary Fuel Water Separator Engine Oil Standard Efficiency Features standard elements for normal duty filtration. Designed to maintain system cleanliness. Removes contaminants before the fluid reaches critical component

CAT FILTERS FIND THE RIGHT CAT FILTER TO REPL ACE A COMPETITOR APPLICATION GUIDE Did you know that the Cat Filter Cross Reference Tool has gotten even better? The added functionality now allows you to search Cat filters by entering a Cat machine model or serial number prefix. Plus, the updated tool has added filter types such as screen, breather, and strainer filters to the list of filters you can find, including engine oil, engine air, fuel, fuel water separator, hydraulic, transmission, and cabin filters. Heres how it works! There are three main tabs across the top of the page Cross reference, Cat machine model, and Cat serial number prefix. Using the cross reference tab, you can search for a Cat filter using a competitive part number. The Cat machine model tab has you input the machine or engine model to search for Cat filters, but you can narrow the search by selecting a specific serial number prefix or filter type. The Cat serial number prefix tab search has you input the machine or engine serial number prefix and can be narrowed by adding a filter type. Once you see your list of Cat filters, you can quickly purchase a single filter by clicking on the yellow shopping cart icon, which directs you to parts.cat.com, or build a parts shopping list by clicking on the blue cart icon. Using the shopping list allows you to Buy Now with parts.cat.com or Export the list to save for a later purchase. 1 FIND THE RIGHT FILTER EFFICIENCY TABLES * If a part is not listed there is no higher-grade filter option available. Please refer to the online Parts book or SIS2GO. We also recommend reviewing your selection with your Cat dealer. 1 These filters became and most continue to be the factory first-fit during or after initial installation. The exception is the 3500 series engine lube filters, where regulations still allow the use of the 1R-0726 filter. This filter is specific to captive 3500 engines (used in electric power, marine, and pump applications) and is the preferred replacement. Spin-on filters for the 3500 series 272-1788, 275-2604, and 244-4484 are primarily used in machine applications, with 275-2604 currently being the factory first-fit. 2 Filters 479-0855 and 479-0856 are identical to 438-5385 and 438-5386, but painted white for marine use to match Cat Marine engines. FILTER TYPE STANDARD EFFICIENCY ADVANCED EFFICIENCY ULTRA- HIGH EFFICIENCY UHE +ALL METAL Standard efficiency filters are intended for engines manufactured before 2004, prior to the implementation of emission regulations that required the use of advanced efficiency media. Most are factory first fit. Load ratings do not apply to this filter type. 1 Enhanced filtration to capture smaller, more damaging particles in your highly sensitive systems. Designed with the most advanced media for increased efficiency while maintaining capacity. Filters feature a one-piece metal can that collects separated water internally eliminating the need for an external water bowl. MOVE UP FOR INCREASED

Downtime means lost revenue. To keep your equipment in service you need filters that deliver superior performance and a reliable supplier that offers complete coverage for your entire fleet. With Donaldson protection, your engines and equipment can operate longer between filter replacements, saving on costly downtime and repairs. Depend on Donaldson when every operating hour counts. From proprietary bulk filtration products that filter fuel before it even enters your machine, over state-of- the-art air cleaners and emissions products to clean exhaust gases as much as possible. Donaldson has got you covered with more than 100 years of filtration expertise. Lube, Fuel and Coolant Filtration Donaldson filters work hard to remove harmful contaminants from your engine liquids. They enhance engine and equipment life and performance while protecting the environment. When you demand Donaldson for your liquid filtration needs, you get more than just a spin- on or cartridge filter. You have confidence that you are using a brand name the OEMs trust. Lube filters Donaldson lube filters keep oil clean by capturing contaminants that can cause engine damage. Fuel filters Donaldson filters help prevent premature pump wear and injec- tor damage by delivering clean fuel to your engine. Theyre a better way to filter fuel. Coolant

En muchas ciudades ya no permiten circular camiones pesados y los materiales se recogen en vehculos comerciales ligeros en centros logsticos para entregar a los clientes. Como consecuencia, el parque de vehculos comerciales ligeros hasta 7,5 toneladas est incrementando de forma significativa y el mantenimiento de este parque de vehculos representa un potencial creciente. La calidad de los filtros Fleetguard representan una ventanilla nica al sector de la distribucin urbana. A continuacin le proponemos unas aplicaciones claves de filtros Fleetguard de calidad a un precio competitivo. En caso de tener alguna consulta hable con el gerente comercial sobre las aplicaciones que le interesan. Nos adentramos juntos en este prometedor mercado que nos proporcionar grandes beneficios mutuos. Los filtros de lubricante Donaldson estn diseados para mantener los sistemas de lubricacin de los motores actuales funcionando al mximo rendimiento. Mantenga el aceite limpio capturando los contaminantes que causan daos al motor. Incluye componentes de alta resistencia construidos para rendir, construidos para durar. Ofrece una proteccin esencial del motor para un mximo rendimiento en fro. alternatives primary application filter families dimensions Distribution Centers Global Presence with Local Touch Donaldson has established a global distribution network to serve our customers locally as well as worldwide. We operate as a global company with a network for primary distribution locations that support a mature hub of regional distribution centers and warehouses. Donaldson distribution centers are strategically located to quickly and accurately deliver filtration and exhaust products wherever replacement products are needed. We work with a network of transportation, third part logistics companies, consolidators, and cross-docking facilities to meet or exceed our customers requirements. All regions of the world benefit from our global umbrella of distribution centers. We focus our efforts on local support and the capabilities of our staff. We continue to make significant investments in facilities, systems, supply chain relationships and staffing to offer the best order fulfillment options available. HARD WORK ITS IN OUR BLOOD AGRICULTURE FILTRATION QUALITY When it comes to protecting your equipment, you dont settle for anything but the best. Neither does Baldwin. Every phase of production, from raw material purchase to final inspection, is designed to ensure the highest quality and performance standards. SERVICE Getting an honest answer is important to you. Baldwin agrees. We value your trust and work hard to provide the support and answers you deserve. With the largest, most experienced field sales and support team in the industry, Baldwin has your back. AVAILABILITY Quality and high performance are not enough. Baldwin delivers. With an extensive distribution network and an unmatched factory fill-rate, you can trust Baldwin has the filters you need, when and where you need them. WERE YOU BORN IN A BARN? Maybe not, but farming is in your blood. You work hard every day. Its a tough life, with plenty to worry about. You shouldnt have to worry about filtration. Let Baldwin make it easier. Baldwin has been around for generations. We have the coverage, quality, service and dependability you need. BF46002 TOUGH PROTECTION FOR CUMMINS QSK MCRS ENGINES ENGINEERED MEDIA WITH HIGHLY Stricter emission regulations have forced engine manufacturers to design cleaner, more efficient engines. These new engine systems require higher fuel pressures (up to 60,000 psi) and tighter tolerances. Microscopic particles in the fuel (as small as 2 to 3 microns) under high pressure, can cause abrasive wear, severely damaging fuel injection system components. With so much at risk, todays equipment manufacturers require fuel entering the fuel injection system to be clean and free of contaminants, meeting strict ISO 4406 fuel cleanliness level of 12/9/6. Baldwin Filters BF46002, with Highly Engineered Layered Media (HELM), helps prevent premature injector wear and

Innovative Filtration Solutions Providing Superior Protection In A Compact Package Improved Engine Protection Design traps contaminants within the filter, preventing them from being passed on to the engine. Durable Frame The Channel Flow frame fully encloses the filter, protecting the media from damage during installation and preventing air from being drawn in through the sides of the filter. Straight-Through Air Flow Pattern Reduces the amount of space, up to 50%, of traditional filters and allows for new installation possibilities. Compact, Lightweight Allows for easier installation and service in tight, compact areas. Environmentally Friendly Non-metal filter elements allow for easier, more environmentally friendly disposal and are fully incinerable. Baldwins Channel Flow Air Filters... A Stronger Design For Outstanding Protection With the continued demand for higher performance engines, along with stricter emission regulations, leading construction and agricultural manufacturers are designing vehicles with more compact air intake systems. These innovative designs mean better performance, but have less installation space under the hood. Baldwin Filters patent pending Channel Flow air filters provide superior filtration solutions in a lightweight, compact design for easy installation in less space. This new straight-through air flow technology not only allows for less installation space, but also offers manufacturers flexibility in design configuration. Channel Flow Air Filters Meet High Performance Demands Stronger Media Support Provides essential support when the pressure differential across the element increases due to moisture or contamination. Increased differential pressure can cause the element to telescope, which can damage the filter. Alternately Closed Channels Air enters the open channels, trapping contaminants inside the filter and allowing clean air to flow through the filter media and out the open channels on the opposite end. Channel Flow vs. Traditional Filters More Surface Area Baldwins Channel Flow filter has more surface area than a traditional air filter, while requiring the same or less installation space. The Channel Flow media is formed by layering alternating rows of flat sheets and corrugated media. When completed, the media resembles a honeycomb network of channels. As the media pack is formed, alternating channels are sealed with a bead of adhesive. Air enters open channels and flows through the media and out through adjacent open channels. Increased Capacity Traditional air filters have an average capacity of about 1 unit of contaminant per unit volume, where as the Channel Flow filter holds 2 units of contaminant per unit volume. This gives Channel Flow twice the capacity of traditional air filters. High Efficiency Tests show Channel Flow filters have an average efficiency of 99.99%. EXTREME PERFORMANCE AIR FILTERS GREATER EFFICIENCY & CAPACITY FOR LONGER LIFE Ideally suited to demanding high dust environments, Baldwins Extreme Performance air filters oer fleet operators significant benefits over conventional cellulose-only media. Baldwins Extreme Performance air filters utilize nanofiber technology. Nanofiber, bonded to cellulose media, provides unequalled performance, particularly with submicron contaminants. While nanofiber cannot be seen with the naked eye, the Baldwin nanofiber base sheet is yellow to distinguish it from conventional media. All Baldwin Extreme Performance heavy-duty air filters are identified with an XP part number sux. Engine Liquid Filtration Guide for Medium & Heavy-duty Engines, Vehicles and Equipment Donaldson Delivers! When you need fuel, lube oil or coolant filtration systems for new and existing engine applications, consider Donaldson as your single source. Our solutions enhance your equipment design, protect your engine components and can improve your overall vehicle maintenance experience. Lube Fuel Coolant SAY HELLO TO BLUE. DONALDSON WE RAISED THE STANDARD IN FILTER PERFORMANCE. Youll recognize the ultimate in heavy-duty engine filtration solutions. Theyre Donaldson Blue . With industry-leading technologies like Synteq XP media for fuel and Ultra-Web media for air filters, you can trust Donaldson Blue to clean in the harshest environments. Blue Proof your equipment with proven performance that pays off. Further product details are available on pages 76-77 (fuel), 84-85 (lube) and 112 (coolant). Engine Liquid Filtration 1 www.donaldson.com Engine Liquid Filtration Product Guide Table of Contents Contamination control is critical for diesel engines Diesel engine technology continues to evolve quickly in response to increasingly stringent emissions standards. Todays engines now operate at much higher temperatures and under much greater pressures. Because tolerances have become tighter, contamination control for fuel, lube, and coolant systems is critical. Donaldson offers advanced filtration solutions for all engine liquids. This product guide helps to identify the filtration challenges faced by modern engines and offers a broad array of Donaldson know-how and filtration solutions to meet even the most demanding requirements yours. Donaldson distribution centers are strategically located to quickly and accurately deliver filtration and exhaust products wherever replacement products are needed. fuente: Filtrado de aire de sello radial Magnum RS -Spanish-LT15062.pdf
data: A I R E Magnum RS Filtro de Aire Sellado Radial Diseado para satisfacer las fuertes demandas del equipo que opera en los ambientes ms hostiles, los elementos para aire primario y de seguridad de sello radial Magnum RS proporcionan un Valor Real. El Magnum RS ofrece caractersticas singulares que proporcionan beneficios significativos para obtener una vida de servicio mayor y un ptimo desempeo cuando el trabajo lo exige. Valor REAL ElValorREAL es no preocuparse acerca de su filtro de aire an en los ambientes ms extremosos... El Valor REAL es ahorrar tiempo y dinero con intervalos de servicio y vida del motor extendidos... El Valor REAL es la confiabilidad que proporcionan los Filtros de Aire Magnum Fleetguard . Mejor flujo de aire para lograr la mxima vida del motor Mayor capacidad y durabilidad para obtener intervalos de servicio extendidos Probado en carretera por ms de 20 aos Aprobado por los Equipos Originales Aplicaciones Dentro de carretera Fuera de carretera Todos los Equipos Originales principales, incluyendo Caterpillar , GM , Chrysler , Ford , Freightliner , Kenworth , International , PACCAR , Volvo y otros Diseo Cerrado Moldeado de Uretano Cordn Espiral de Pegamento Fundido en Caliente Sellado de Poliuretano Medio de Celulosa Para obtener ms informacin, visite cumminsfiltration.com LT15062-LA 2008 Cummins Filtration Impreso en Mxico Filtracin para el Mundo REAL Proteccin REAL en Condiciones de Operacin Difciles El Magnum RS ofrece: El Ms Alto Rendimiento El medio de celulosa en el Magnum RS est tratado con resina y corrugado a la mxima profundidadpara obtener una mayor superficie de filtracin y canales precisos para lograr un mejor flujo de aire.El cordn espiral de pegamento fundido en caliente mantiene el plegado espaciado uniformemente logrando una capacidad ptima en retencin de contaminantes. La Mejor Proteccin El Magnum RS tiene un diseo cerrado moldeado de uretano evitando la posibilidad que se presente la oxidacin debido a la humedad, durante toda la vida del filtro. Confiabilidad y Durabilidad El sellado de poliuretano ha sido probado en el laboratorio a temperaturas de 40 a 180 sin fallas o fugas, as como probado en campo por miles de horas en aplicaciones dentro y fuera de carretera con un desempeo sin fallas. Poco Mantenimiento y Fcil Servicio Fabricado para facilitar el mantenimiento y un manejo fuerte, el Magnum RS permite lograr un servicio sin problemas haciendo que los vehculos vuelvan a operar rpidamente. Nota:Como siempre, Cummins Filtration no recomienda mezclar marcas diferentes de filtros de aire primarios y secundarios en la misma carcaza al mismo tiempo. Para obtener una lista completa de nmeros de parte Magnum RS, por favor consulte nuestro catlogo.

data: FILTROS DE AIRE DE CABINA, NO SON UN LUJO! Es un hecho universal que los vehculos comerciales actuales estn equipados con un so# sticado sistema de aire acondicionado. Este sistema garantiza que el aire del compartimento del pasajero de un vehculo determinado se caliente/enfre, ventile y # ltre de una forma apropiada. Desde el punto de vista de la salud y la seguridad, esto es de vital importancia para mejorar el confort trmico y proteger tanto a pasajeros como a conductores de cualquier partcula o contaminante perjudicial o que pueda ocasionar una reaccin alrgica. Mientras que las cabinas de los vehculos de pasajeros o los camiones estn equipadas, por lo general, con un nico # ltro de aire de cabina, los sistemas de aire acondicionado de un autobs articulado o de un autocar de lujo pueden incluir hasta diez. Filtros de aire de cabina asociados al sistema. FLEETGUARD: LA PRIMERA ELECCIN DE LOS CLIENTES Cummins Filtration ofrece una amplia gama de # ltros de aire de cabina de calidad tanto estndar como de carbn activado. Los # ltros de aire de cabina Fleetguard son la primera eleccin tanto de los principales fabricantes de equipos originales (OEM) para camiones europeos (aplicaciones de Euro IV a Euro VI) como de los fabricantes ms conocidos de sistemas de aire acondicionado integrado utilizados en autobuses y autocares (Webasto, Konvekta). Page D1 _________D Cross Reference by Part Number In the following pages are listed thousands of competitive filter manufacturers and original equipment part numbers, in numeric-alpha order. Simply locate your part number (ignore initial zeros, dashes, and periods). The Fleetguard part number is then referenced, along with a code to the competitive manufacturer. A listing of codes and manufacturers names follows immediately. Always verify the manufacturers name to assure that the cross reference is correct, as numbers may be duplicated by different manufacturers. For part numbers not listed in this section, please visit www.cumminsfiltration.com or contact your local Cummins Filtration office. Correspondances par numro de pice Dans les pages qui suivent, vous trouverez une liste comportant des milliers de numros de pices de fabricants de filtres concurrents et de constructeurs, rpertoris par ordre alphanumrique. Il vous suffit de chercher la rfrence (ne tenez pas compte du zro initial, des tirets et des points). Le numro de pice Fleetguard est indiqu, avec droite une abrviation du nom du fabricant. Vous trouverez en fin de rubrique une liste donnant les abrviations et noms des fabricants. Vrifiez toujours le nom du fabricant, pour vous assurer que la correspondance est bonne, les mmes numros pouvant tre utilises par diffrents fabricants. Si les numros des pices que vous recherchez napparaissent pas sous cette rubrique, veuillez consulter www.cumminsfiltration.com ou prendre contact avec votre centre de distribution Cummins Filtration local. Querverweis anhand der Bauteilnummer Auf den folgenden Seiten finden Sie eine Liste von Herstellern und Bauteilnummern (Originalprodukte) in alphanumerischer Reihenfolge. Machen Sie Ihre Bauteilnummer ausfindig (erste Nullstelle, Punkte und Bindestriche knnen ignoriert werden). Die Fleetguard-Bauteilnummer wird dann gemeinsam mit dem Code anderer Hersteller angezeigt. Unmittelbar darauf folgt eine Liste von Codes und Herstellernamen. Bitte berprfen Sie den Herstellernamen um sicherzustellen, dass es sich um den richtigen Querverweis handelt, da es vorkommt, dass von verschiedenen Herstellern dieselbe Bauteilnummer verwendet wird. Falls Sie Ihre Bauteilnummer nicht in diesem Abschnitt finden knnen, besuchen Sie bitte www.cumminsfiltration.com oder wenden Sie sich an Ihren Cummins Filtration-Vertreter vor Ort. Engine Liquid Filtration Guide for Medium & Heavy-duty Engines, Vehicles and Equipment Donaldson Delivers! When you need fuel, lube oil or coolant filtration systems for new and existing engine applications, consider Donaldson as your single source. Our solutions enhance your equipment design, protect your engine components and can improve your overall vehicle maintenance experience. Lube Fuel Coolant SAY HELLO TO BLUE. DONALDSON WE RAISED THE STANDARD IN FILTER PERFORMANCE. Youll recognize the ultimate in heavy-duty engine filtration solutions. Theyre Donaldson Blue . With industry-leading technologies like Synteq XP media for fuel and Ultra-Web media for air filters, you can trust Donaldson Blue to clean in the harshest environments. Blue Proof your equipment with proven performance that pays off. Further product details are available on pages 76-77 (fuel), 84-85 (lube) and 112 (coolant). Engine Liquid Filtration 1 www.donaldson.com Engine Liquid Filtration Product Guide Table of Contents Contamination control is critical for diesel engines Diesel engine technology continues to evolve quickly in response to increasingly stringent emissions standards. Todays engines now operate at much higher temperatures and under much greater pressures. Because tolerances have become tighter, contamination control for fuel, lube, and coolant systems is critical. Donaldson offers advanced filtration solutions for all engine liquids. This product guide helps to identify the filtration challenges faced by modern engines and offers a broad array of Donaldson know-how and filtration solutions to meet even the most demanding requirements yours. Spin-ons Cartridges In-tank Low Pressure Medium Pressure High Pressure Duplex Accessories Hydraulic Filtration Product Guide Distributed by: Donaldson Delivers Performance Under Any Pressure! Clean, dry oil is essential for your equipment. Donaldson Company, a leader in filtration for over 100 years, has proven performance in thousands of applications offering the industry's largest selection of replacement hydraulic, lube and gear oil filtration products for contamination control. How Donaldson Displays Filter Flow versus Pressure Loss Data The Importance of Temperature in Determining Pressure Drop Fluid viscosity plays an important role in restricting the flow through filters. Its crucial to select the proper filter to maintain adequate flow and avoid excessive pressure drops. Measured in centiStokes (cSt) or Saybolt Seconds Universal (SSU or SUS), fluid viscosity is the resistance of a fluid to flow (thickness of fluid). Low viscosity fluids pass through filters with less resistance than high viscosity fluids. Higher fluid viscosities have higher pressure drops due to higher resistance passing through the media. The colder the fluid, the higher the viscosity, so the lowest potential temperature of the fluid is the best measure for calculating pressure drop. Use the chart below to determine the viscosity of the fluid to be filtered at its lowest potential temperature. Pressure Drop (P) Correction Formulae To properly calculate pressure loss for viscosity and/or specific gravity, use the filter and housing formulae below to determine the clean filter assembly pressure drop. Performance Curve Notes All flow measurements were made with 32cSt [150 SSU] hydraulic oil at 100F (37.7C), fluid specific gravity of 0.9. The performance curves displayed are for the filter, head or housing assembly. Filter performance curves will either list media numbers or beta ratings (see circled areas on chart above). These labels correspond with the filter choice tables. Spin-ons Cartridges In-tank Low Pressure Medium Pressure High Pressure Duplex Accessories Hydraulic Filtration Product Guide Distributed by: Donaldson Delivers Performance Under Any Pressure! Clean, dry oil is essential for your equipment. Donaldson Company, a leader in filtration for over 100 years, has proven performance in thousands of applications offering the industry's largest selection of replacement hydraulic, lube and gear oil filtration products for contamination control. How Donaldson Displays Filter Flow versus Pressure Loss Data The Importance of Temperature in Determining Pressure Drop Fluid viscosity plays an important role in restricting the flow through filters. Its crucial to select the proper filter to maintain adequate flow and avoid excessive pressure drops. Measured in centiStokes (cSt) or Saybolt Seconds Universal (SSU or SUS), fluid viscosity is the resistance of a fluid to flow (thickness of fluid). Low viscosity fluids pass through filters with less resistance than high viscosity fluids. Higher fluid viscosities have higher pressure drops due to higher resistance passing through the media. The colder the fluid, the higher the viscosity, so the lowest potential temperature of the fluid is the best measure for calculating pressure drop. Use the chart below to determine the viscosity of the fluid to be filtered at its lowest potential temperature. Pressure Drop (P) Correction Formulae To properly calculate pressure loss for viscosity and/or specific gravity, use the filter and housing formulae below to determine the clean filter assembly pressure drop. MANUAL OF VISUAL CORPORATE IDENTITY WWW.ELIMFILTERS.COM USING THE IDENTITY n this manual are described the basic elements of the visual corporate identity for distributors ELIMFILTERS and its implementation standards are defined. With the proper usage of these elements a high impact and remembrance will be achieved. It is essential to apply them as shown on this document to reinforce the marketing work and advertising applications that complement the image of the premises. * For special cases or doubts, you should consult directly with the marketing department. ELIMFILTERS is an entity that operates in several regions of the country and the world. The brand is the biggest expression of the entity and contains its personality, it one of the greatest assets. The proper use of the EMILFILTERS logo on all communication pieces is essential to create a strong and long-lasting image. This manual oers the comprehension of the brands visual components of the brand and how to use them. Following it will help create a brand as powerful as the entity it represents and where the uniqueness of the image is one of its biggest strengths. I The corporate identity manual sets out the following most common definitions of the concepts used. LOGO Graphical representation of the brand name. It is composed of exclusive text, with a distinctive design according to specific typographic criteria. It can be complemented with a symbol or isotype to integrate together the visual identity of a company. IMAGOTYPE Integrated graphic brand, such as the isologue, by a combination of isotype and logo, although in this case image and text do not merge, but are associated by proximity. ISOTYPE Non-typographic design (in that case it would be a logo) used to visually identify a brand. Its iconic nature can be abstract or a figurative representation of the products or services oered by the company. BASIC CONCEPTS ISOLOGOTYPE Graphic brand composed of a combination of isotype and logo integrated in a single design. MONOGRAM Acronym in which the various initials that represent the brand name overlap by integrating into a composition that borders the abstraction (isotype). BRAND IMAGE The brand from the perspective of the public. It corresponds to the way in which he experiences the individuality of a product, service or company through a series of associations (positive or negative), regardless of the brand identity that the trader has wanted to transmit. BRAND IMAGE IMAGOTIPO The graphic image must be protected in its spaces, by some margins around the logo that must always be respected and be free from the intrusion of other graphic elements to ensure its readability. Perfect service. www.mann-filter.com Select your language With interactive content The best in the long run With MANN-FILTER you get the maximum of the service interval, an optimal engine performance with long life filters It fits your fleet MANN-FILTER puts at your disposal the widest range with a broad coverage for trucks and buses around the globe to keep your fleet running We care Our product range goes beyond, the portfolio has all the needed solutions to protect the vehicle engine, its surrounding environment and furthermore, the driver Be ready to go MANN-FILTER offers filters and accessories created to minimize cost- and time-intensive downtimes from the start with guaranteed OE quality and first class filtration Euro 6 is the latest European Commission legislation implemented to reduce engine emissions of carbon monoxide (CO), hydrocarbons (HC), nitrogen oxides (NOx) and particulate matter (PM). It is the most challenging standard to date and is clearly focused on reducing commercial vehicle emissions. Euro 6 became mandatory for all new type approvals in September 2014 and all new registrations in September 2015. The latest standard cuts diesel NOx emissions by 56% making Euro 6 vehicles very environmentally friendly and close to pollution free. MANN-FILTER for trucks and buses Even under the hardest conditions, our products are characterized by an extremely long service life. Because with MANN-FILTER, you are assured of 100 percent OE quality! On the following pages you can find all the available MANN-FILTER products for trucks and buses models with Euro 6 engine type. MANN-FILTER for trucks and buses Close to pollution free with Euro 6 The latest standard cuts diesel NOx emissions by 56%. Benefits that pay for you: Euro 6 ist die aktuelle Abgas-Gesetzgebung der Europischen Kommis- sion. Die Norm soll den Aussto von Motorabgasen wie Kohlenmonoxid (CO), Kohlenwasserstoffen (HC), Stickstoffoxiden (NOx) und Feinstaub (PM) reduzieren. Es handelt sich um die bisher anspruchsvollste Rege- lung dieser Art. Mit ihr soll insbesondere eine Senkung des Ausstoes von Nutzfahrzeugen erreicht werden. Euro 6 ist seit September 2014 Vorschrift fr alle neuen Typgenehmigungen und seit September 2015 fr alle Neuzulassungen. Die aktuelle Norm reduziert den NOx-Aussto um 56 %. Fahrzeuge, die die Euro 6-Norm erfllen, sind damit beson- ders umweltfreundlich und nahezu schadstofffrei. SNAPP The One-Piece, High-Performance Snap-In Fuel Filter Water Separator For Marine and Mobile Applications Now, getting the fuel filtration you need ... is a SNAPP. SNAPP. The fuel filter change that changes everything. The world turns to Racor for filtration solutions that provide ultimate protection from water and solid contamination. This is filtration that includes two innovations often copied but never quite duplicated the powerful protection of patented, world-class Aquabloc Synergy filter media and, the Racor trademark, a clear bowl that allows for at-a-glance inspection of fuel system integrity. Fast, easy, clean, SNAPP is a fuel filter change for the better SNAPP is big protection for small engines and makes every filter change literally a snap. Fast, easy, clean. No tools are needed when its time for service, simply snap in a new filter. Simple installation and a patented priming system mean that protecting your engine investment is now ... a SNAPP. 2 SNAPP is a one-piece fuel filter water separator that is tool-free and fast to service. Mighty small. Small but mighty. For E10 gasoline, diesel and bio-diesel applications - At just 4" x 8", SNAPP fits anywhere, protects everywhere. Quick-connect fittings for fast, confident connections. Quick-release squeeze tabs make filter changes a snap. Permanent mounting bracket withstands corrosive environments. SNAPP is a one-piece fuel filter water separator for 24/7 protection, even with E10 gasoline and bio-diesel. Heavy-duty high-impact nylon construction wont ever rust or corrode, even in humid conditions. Clear bowl for at-a-glance inspection. The rugged clear bowl allows on-the-spot inspection for water in fuel a significant advantage when troubleshooting fuel quality. 3 Legendary Aquabloc Synergy filter media in 2, 10 or 30 micron rating. The Aquabloc Synergy media is the worlds definitive filtration protection it's 99% effective in separating water and solid contamination from diesel and bio-diesel. The Racor self-venting drain means easy service with no mess twist, drain, done. AQUABLOC SYNERGY ENGINEERED MEDIA The Heart & Soul of Ultimate Engine Protection 4 Stage One: Coalescing Water droplets coalesce on the upstream of a chemically-treated composite media. As the droplets grow in size, and being heavier than fuel, they fall into the collection bowl to be drained away. Importantly, the large surface area of the pleated media lowers the fuel face velocity, enabling an extraordinary water removal efficiency of +99% (SAE J1839). This level of water removal is essential for complete engine protection. Sensitive diesel fuel injection systems demand complete removal of damaging water and solid contamination. Yet, diesel fuel additives and bio-diesel have made separation of water and solid particulates more challenging than ever. MARINE Filtration Systems 2 Parker EMOE is excited to introduce the all new Racor 900VMA and 1000VMA fuel filters. Also available as 75900VMA, 751000VMA (duplex) and 791000VMA (triplex) assemblies. The all new design adds ports, is less restrictive, and improves water separation. Larger ports decrease restriction, and two (2) inlet and two (2) outlet ports, allow installation in any configuration required to meet fuel delivery needs. A Shut-off valve is integrated into each individual unit eliminating the need for up stream valves in the fuel delivery line. Models that include a stainless steel shield are UL-listed, and USCG accepted. Models that include an all metal aluminum bowl are UL-listed, American Bureau of Shipping, and Bureau Veritas accepted. At the heart of every Turbine unit, a new service filter featuring the Aquabloc Synergy media has been created. The new service filters are designed for the new assemblies. They are backward compatible with previous assembly models. V Series - Marine Turbine Assemblies Increased Efficiency, Capacity, and Reliability 1 Redesigned FeaturesBenefits Integrated Gauge Port Front access NPT gauge port. Easy Access Integrated gauge port provides easy to access location to install gauge for filter life monitoring. Larger Port Size 1-5/16 inch ports. (2) inlets and (2) outlets. Less Restriction Larger ports decrease restriction for the assembly. Conical Baffle, Bowl and Drain New turbine separator design combined with our Signature large clear bowl and quick turn drain. Improved Separation and Service The new conical baffle optimizes separation of free water found in fuels. The large bowl provide at-a-glance viewing for speedy service. Dual Inlet / Outlet Ports Multiple inlets and outlets. Installation Convenience Dual inlets and outlets make the new assemblies easy to configure for any installation. Service Filter A new 2020V10 or 2040V10 service filter is included in the new V series models and assemblies. Better Performance Aquabloc Synergy media designed for filtration performance to meet todays fuel filtration challenges. Integrated Valve A shut-off valve integrated into each housing. Simplifies Service Integrated shut-off valve eliminates the need for up stream valves in the fuel delivery line. Top Load Filter A drop in filter with easy to use bail handles when servicing. Quick Service The drop-in filter makes service fast and easy. 1 2 Legendary Diesel Fuel Filtration When engines demand heavy- duty, high-capacity water separation and fuel filtration, the Turbine Series is the most complete, efficient, and reliable engine protection you can install.
